quote: Aslan"" said Lucy ""you're bigger"".""That is because you are older, little one"" answered he.""Not because you are?""""I am not. But every year you grow, you will find me bigger"".
quote_letters: ASLAN SAID LUCY YOURE BIGGERTHAT IS BECAUSE YOU ARE OLDER LITTLE ONE ANSWERED HENOT BECAUSE YOU AREI AM NOT BUT EVERY YEAR YOU GROW YOU WILL FIND ME BIGGER
